Summary: AppTheme-driven theming: define tokens/styles and switch Light/Dark at runtime.
Remarks: Create theme tokens with AppThemeColor (Light/Dark values) and reference them via DynamicResource from styles. Use AppThemeBinding on properties when you need per-control Light/Dark values. Derive brand themes by merging an extra ResourceDictionary that overrides tokens while keeping style keys the same. In MauiReactor, switch themes by setting Application.Current.UserAppTheme; all controls bound to AppTheme/ DynamicResource update instantly without manual re-rendering.
Example:
<ResourceDictionary>
  <!-- Theme tokens: Light/Dark values -->
  <AppThemeColor x:Key="Primary" Light="#0078D4" Dark="#2B2D31" />
  <Color x:Key="Accent">#FF8C00</Color>

  <!-- Styles consume tokens via DynamicResource -->
  <Style TargetType="Label" x:Key="BaseLabel">
    <Setter Property="TextColor" Value="{DynamicResource Primary}" />
    <Setter Property="FontFamily" Value="OpenSansRegular" />
  </Style>

  <!-- Direct AppThemeBinding (per-control) -->
  <Style TargetType="Label" x:Key="TitleLabel">
    <Setter Property="TextColor" Value="{AppThemeBinding Light=Black, Dark=White}" />
  </Style>
</ResourceDictionary>

<!-- Use styles on pages -->
<Label Style="{StaticResource BaseLabel}" Text="Hello theme" />
<Label Style="{StaticResource TitleLabel}" Text="Title" />

// app.AddResource("Resources/Styles/BaseTheme.xaml");
// app.AddResource("Resources/Styles/BrandOverrides.xaml"); // overrides Primary, Accent, etc.

// C# (MauiReactor): toggle theme at runtime
class ThemePage : Component
{
    public override VisualNode Render()
        => new ContentPage
        {
            new VStack(12)
            {
                new Label("Hello theme"),
                new Button("Toggle Light/Dark")
                    .OnClicked(() =>
                    {
                        var app = Application.Current;
                        if (app != null)
                        {
                            app.UserAppTheme = app.UserAppTheme == AppTheme.Dark ? AppTheme.Light : AppTheme.Dark;
                        }
                    })
            }
            .Padding(16)
        };
}
